lines.text: Because I don't have the guts.
Who does the cooking at your house?
Well, your Cinderella's got a pistol this big in her bag.
The drummer never divulges his name.

[to La préfète]
Stop! Tell your story to someone else... because I don't give a fuck about all this bullshit.

[singing]
How can I keep on smiling at their disguise? When I know nothing good ever comes from lies. My heart is no beginner. But still, I can lose my temper. Yeah. How can we keep on watching that fuckin' TV? We're so bored, we don't even care what we see. Takes our strength away. And never, never shows us the way. No. But I think I know the answer. It's only mystery and I like it.

[to The Roller Skater]
Police. Handcuffs. Prison.

[after seeing his wife crying]
Mrs. Kerman, is there a problem?
No. I was just telling your wife that I don't give a fuck about her stories.

[singing]
Guns don't kill people. People kill people.
I'm moving out. You're life's story is fucking depressing.
Son of a bitch, a drummer with no fucking sense of timing.
Oh yeah, there's a picture of you as a kid too. 9 years old, 60 pounds,
Oh, you were a looker even back then... I'll knock the price down to 10,000 if you let me keep it.

[Helena is sporting a very ratted hairdo for a fancy dinner]
What is that hairdo?
[the door opens, holds her hand up]
So what're you doing down here?
Ha! That's a good question! Can I trust you?
